content:
Hi Team,

I have followed all the steps mentioned on the Git - but unable to get the clientDetails page while launching the Spring Boot app through Terminal, instead of the page it shows something written in json. 2021-09-20-14_06_01-localhost_8085_clientDetails.png

Here is the log file. ecrNow.log
@Nagesh Bashyam @Santosh Jami @Suprakash Maity - any help would be highly appreciated.
You have to download and setup ecrNow UI project to get the client details page

Nagesh Bashyam said:

You have to download and setup ecrNow UI project to get the client details page

Thanks Nagesh for the response, however I am not sure if I know anything around the UI project, it would be great if you can provide any further information on how to do this.
